alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of , the City of Norfolk, the northwestern City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth and the northeastern City of Suffolk through 245 PM EDT... At 137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms over Cradock, or near Downtown Portsmouth, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Churchland around 150 PM EDT. Western Branch and Bowers Hill around 155 PM EDT. Suffolk around 215 PM EDT. Driver and Crittenden around 220 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hobson, South Norfolk, Wilroy, Portlock, Wards Corner, Huntersville, Deanes, Herberts Corner and Magnolia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
